NAEB HEADj! ;AR i
MAY 3 1 1961
THE FLORIDA STATE UNIVERSITY 9,10.1* 1
TALLAHASSEE
BROADCASTING SERVICES
May 22, 1961
Mr. William G. Harley
Radio Hall
University of Wisconsin
Madison, Wisconsin
Dear Bill:
Thanks for having Miss Mcllvane write me. Sorry the resume was
not included. I didn*t know about your extended trip to Europe,
and it is possible that you are on it at the moment. However,
this is to let you know that I will start on July 1 as Director
„of Public Relations and Associate Professor of Journalism at
Winthrop College, the South Carolina State College for Women,
at Rock Hill.
Since I will still be in Region II, is there any need to have
a new director for radio for the balance of the term? I am
planning to attend the Seminar in Madison, may bring my family.
Winthrop has a carrier-current student radio station which I will
get affiliated with NAEB. Will have to be as an associate until we
move into FM....which is part of the plan at present.
I«m sending the resume along anyhow because the Winthrop College
job is a compromise. I may want to stay for the rest of my life,
and I may want to move within a year or so.
Sincerely,
R<
Director
RF/as
